alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 03 at 5:49AM PST until January 03 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minimum temperatures between 29 and 34 degrees are expected to bring areas of frost. The coldest temperatures are expected in the Ojai Valley, as well as the corridor between Westlake Village and Woodland Hills where isolated freeze conditions are likely. * WHERE...Ventura County Interior Valleys, Ventura County Coastal Valleys and San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys
